recipesJson.name: Chocolate Milks - DEAD SIMPLE
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: This is a dead simple Chocolate Milk recipe, that utilizes "that" chocolate I've been looking for, for a long time. Milk Chocolate, and Milk. Delicious.

reviews.text: The OOO Chocolate Milk and the FW Yogurt go really well together! Chocolate flavors have always been a difficulty for me, and this nails 90% of what I have been looking for. I am going to play around with adding some Double Chocolate (Clear) in my next batch to see if I can get a slightly richer chocolate tone. Thanks!

Every so often I get a craving for chocolate milk and I'll buy a pint while grocery shopping.  I know I shouldn't because of all the fat and sugars, but I buy it anyway.  This is that chocolate milk.  It comes out just like store bought.  I'm on my second batch of it now
My first chocolate recipe and i cant stop mixing it up! It's cost effective and tasty.
I never tried the original golden ticket but for me I liked your previous recipe I mixed this recipe and let it sit for a week it is nice but the chocolate is lacking somewhat
